# Light Novel Image Viewer for macOS (Apple Silicon)

## Version Information
- Version: {{VERSION}}
- Build Time: {{BUILD_TIME}}
- Repository: https://github.com/{{REPOSITORY}}
- Architecture: ARM64 (Apple Silicon)

## Installation
1. Extract the downloaded zip file
2. Drag `light_novel_image.app` to the Applications folder
3. On first launch, you may need to allow the app to run in System Preferences > Security & Privacy

## System Requirements
- macOS 11.0 or later
- Apple Silicon processor (M1/M2/M3 series)

## Features
- EPUB image browsing support
- Drag and drop operations
- Image zoom and view
- Batch file processing
- Native macOS experience
- Optimized for Apple Silicon

## Usage
1. After launching, click "Select EPUB File" or drag EPUB files directly to the window
2. The program will automatically parse images from the EPUB file
3. Use mouse wheel or buttons to zoom images
4. Use arrow keys or buttons to switch between images
5. Right-click menu supports copying images and opening in system viewer

## Notes
- This application is not notarized by Apple, security warning may appear on first launch
- If unable to open, right-click the app in Finder and select "Open"
- File system access permission is required to read EPUB files
- This version is optimized for Macs with Apple Silicon processors
